## guessFieldTypeFromNameAndValue() function

### guessFieldTypeFromNameAndValue() function

Given a name and value, this will pick a reasonable field type

<b>Signature</b>

export declare function guessFieldTypeFromNameAndValue(name: string, v: any): FieldType;
